jd_information.description: Shuttle Bus Driveryou will be responsible to drive designated cars and buses on behalf of the hotel for assigned task in a safe and secured manner following local road safety rules. You are also responsible for the vehicle, its occupants and all contents that belong to guests or hotel. Safety of passengers and self should is a top priority at all times.
